channel.title: üìù Daniel's Notes. on
channel.description: Recent content in üìù Daniel's Notes. on

item.title: Human-centered machine vision?
item.description: From the Click and Collect: Show Me Your Dataset event at Somerset House. See the twitter thread. I presented ongoing research on the [[private/To do/Towards a Computational Video Essay | Computational Supercut]], forthcoming as an article in a special issue on Critical Technical Practice in the journal Convergence.

item.title: Mermaid diagrams
item.description: JavaScript based diagramming and charting tool that renders Markdown-inspired text definitions to create and modify diagrams dynamically. It has a live editor for non-programmers, and has some tutorials.

item.title: Motion Canvas
item.description: Visualize Complex Ideas Programmatically. It’s a specialized tool designed to create informative vector animations and synchronize them with voice-overs.

item.title: Transmediale 2023
item.description: I attended Transmediale and gave a very small presentation as part of the panel Toward Minor Tech.
